about.title: About Me
about.intro: I am Salomao da Silva Santos, a Solution Architect and Technical Lead with extensive experience in building scalable enterprise solutions.
about.expertise: As an evangelist for Adobe Experience Manager (AEM) and AWS AI Vibe Coding Tools, I am passionate about sharing knowledge and helping teams leverage cutting-edge technologies to solve complex business challenges.

article.title: AEM Cloud Service: Major New Features 2025
article.author: By Salomao Santos
article.description: Explore the revolutionary new features of AEM Cloud Service 2025: Edge Computing, update control, authentication, canary deployments, and snapshots for development environments.

pause.title: üéØ Pause Automatic Maintenance Updates
pause.tag: NEW: Full control over updates during critical moments

features.title: Available Features:
features.item1: Quiet Hours: Block automatic updates during specific hours of the day
features.item2: Update-Free Period: Block updates for a complete week
features.item3: Ideal for: Go-live, live events, sales peaks, Black Friday
features.item4: Self-service: Configure directly without support needed

edge.title: üöÄ Edge Computing (Beta)
edge.intro: Execute JavaScript at the CDN layer, processing data closer to the end user.

usecases.title: Use Cases:
usecases.item1: Personalization based on geolocation, device, or user attributes
usecases.item4: Server-rendered HTML composition at the edge
usecases.item5: MCP server exposure for LLMs (ChatGPT, Claude)

auth.title: üîê Edge Authentication (Beta)
auth.intro: Restrict access to Edge Delivery Services pages to authenticated users via IdP.
auth.item1: Configuration via OpenID Connect (OIDC) YAML file
auth.item3: Protection of sensitive content at the edge

canary.title: üß™ Canary Production Deployments (Beta)
canary.intro: Validate production builds with internal traffic before exposing to end users.
canary.item1: Production deploy with restricted traffic (special header)
canary.item2: Monitor behavior before accepting real traffic

snapshots.title: üì∏ RDE Snapshots (Alpha)
snapshots.intro: Take snapshots of current code and content state in Rapid Development Environments.
snapshots.item1: Restore code and content at any time
snapshots.item2: Useful for reverting changes or switching between features
snapshots.item3: Selective restoration of mutable content only
